Traits.Name: Rank and File
Traits.Description: Gain true strike and +1 boon on attacks if adjacent to an ally.

Interrupts.Name: Guardian
Interrupts.Description: When an ally you can see in range 3 is targeted by an attack, you can dash up to 2 spaces towards that ally, ignoring vigilance. Then, if youâ€™re adjacent, you can change the target of the attack to you.

Actions.Name: Bash
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 and must save or become winded.

Actions.Name: Fortify
Actions.Description: Count as in cover and grant cover to adjacent allied characters, but cannot dash or run. End if shoved, dazed, staggered, or stunned.
